text: La bouf est bonne  pour une place a patate. Le service est moyen... mais les prix sont trop cher.

Great lunch. W e had a great lunch of poutine and guedilles (shrimp salad in a hot dog bun). All very tasty. Seating was good inside and out. Menu was interesting. Lots of people enjoying lots of dishes. Service was good and meal came in good time.
Simple hot-dog and patate shack, you sit on old metal milk containers as stools. The place is known for having great poutines. It's what I suggest you have.
